Dylan_Marlowe:
{{short description|American singer-songwriter}} {{use mdy dates|date=September 2024}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Dylan Marlowe | image = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = | birth_place = [[Statesboro, Georgia]], United States | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer-songwriter | instrument = Vocals, guitar | years_active = 2018–present | label = [[Sony Music Nashville]] | associated_acts = | website = {{URL|https://www.dylanmarloweofficial.com/}} }} '''Dylan Marlowe''' is an American [[country music]] singer-songwriter from [[Statesboro, Georgia]] signed to [[Sony Music Nashville]]. ==Background== Marlowe relocated to [[Nashville, Tennessee]] shortly before the start of the [[COVID-19 pandemic]] and signed a publishing and artist development deal with Play It Again Entertainment in 2020. Following several self-released songs, a growing social media presence, and scoring his first Number One hit as a songwriter with [[Jon Pardi]]'s "[[Last Night Lonely]]",{{Cite web |first=Maxim |last=Mower |date=January 10, 2024 |title=Exclusive: Dylan Marlowe on Authenticity, His Debut Album, 'Boys Back Home' and More |url=https://holler.country/news/breaking/exclusive-dylan-marlowe-on-authenticity-his-debut-album-boys-back-home-and-more/ |access-date=August 9, 2024 |website=Holler}} it was announced in January 2023, that Marlowe had signed a recording contract with [[Sony Music Nashville]].{{Cite web |last=Cantrell |first=LB |date=January 27, 2023 |title=Sony Music Nashville Signs Dylan Marlowe |url=https://musicrow.com/2023/01/sony-music-nashville-signs-dylan-marlowe/ |access-date=August 9, 2024 |website=Music Row}} His debut EP with the label, ''Dirt Road When I Die'', was released on July 7, 2023. Marlowe's debut single to country radio, "Boys Back Home" (a duet with [[Dylan Scott]]), was released on December 4, 2023.{{Cite magazine |date=December 4, 2023 |title=Chart Chat |url=https://assets.countryaircheck.com/public/9a096aad-e54d-4456-8d6f260485724392/Issue-887-December-4-2023.pdf |magazine=Country Aircheck Weekly |issue=887 |accessdate=August 9, 2024}} Originally recorded in 2021, its release was delayed due to Scott's ''[[Livin' My Best Life]]'', and Marlowe had to later re-record his vocals when the label decided to issue it as his debut single instead of "Record High". Marlowe's debut studio album, ''Mid-Twenties Crisis'', will be released on September 27, 2024.{{Cite web |last=Hahnen |first=Madison |date=July 26, 2024 |title=Dylan Marlowe Will Explore Mid-Twenties Crisis On Debut Album |url=https://musicrow.com/2024/07/dylan-marlowe-will-explore-mid-twenties-crisis-on-debut-album/ |access-date=August 9, 2024 |website=Music Row}} ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of EPs, with selected details, chart positions and sales ! rowspan="1" style="width:12em;"| Title ! rowspan="1" style="width:18em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row" |''Mid-Twenties Crisis'' | * Release date: September 27, 2024 * Label: [[Sony Music Nashville]] * Format: CD, digital download |- |} ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of EPs, with selected details, chart positions and sales ! rowspan="1" style="width:12em;"| Title ! rowspan="1" style="width:18em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row" |''Dirt Road When I Die''{{Cite web |date=January 5, 2024 |title=Dylan Marlowe — Dirt Road When I Die EP |url=https://music.apple.com/us/album/dirt-road-when-i-die-ep/1689639516 |access-date=July 11, 2024 |website=[[Apple Music]]}} | * Release date: July 7, 2023 * Label: Sony Music Nashville * Format: Digital download |- |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of singles, with selected chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="2"| Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Album |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! scope="col" width="45"| [[Hot Country Songs|US Country Songs]]
